name: Hollywood Mogul 4 - Run Your Own Hollywood Movie Studio
blurb: Run your own Hollywood movie studio in this Strategy Business Sim for Windows\u00ae.

rewards.reward: Every dollar helps, and you have my gratitude.

AUTHOR - you write one source database record in any category + BONUS you may join with friends who have this reward to create a FRANCHISE in the source categories of Novel, Graphic Novel, Game, or Comic Book. You will be a part of Hollywood Mogul 4 forever.

AUTHOR x2 - you write two source database records in any category + BONUS you may join with friends who have this reward to create a FRANCHISE in the source categories of Novel, Graphic Novel, Game, or Comic Book. You will be a part of Hollywood Mogul 4 forever.
GAME - You get one copy of the completed game, but neither of the expansion packs.
GAME + EX PACKS - You get one copy of the completed game + BONUS both expansion packs.

AUTHOR + GAME + EX PACKS + BETA +  DEVELOPMENT FORUMS - You get one copy of the completed game + BONUS both expansion packs + BONUS you can write one source database record in any category + BONUS you are entitled to participate in the forums during the development of the game + BONUS you can play all beta versions as the game develops + BONUS you may join with friends who have this reward to create a FRANCHISE in the source categories of Novel, Graphic Novel, Game, or Comic Book.

GAME + EX PACKS + BETA +  DEVELOPMENT FORUMS - You get one copy of the completed game + BONUS both expansion packs + BONUS you are entitled to participate in the forums during the development of the game + BONUS you can play all beta versions as the game develops.

SCREENWRITER + AUTHOR + GAME + EX PACKS + BETA + DEVELOPMENT FORUMS - You get one copy of the completed game + BONUS both expansion packs + BONUS your name will be hard-coded into the Screenwriter Database, your digital image will appear at the Hollywood Mogul Awards if you are nominated + BONUS you can write one source database record in any category + BONUS you are entitled to participate in the forums during the development of the game + BONUS you can play all beta versions as the game develops. (Please note that to keep things interesting, at the start of each new game, all Screenwriter attributes may be randomized. So in one game you may be one of the best writers in town, and in another game you may be the worst thing to ever hit Hollywood.) + BONUS you may join with friends who have this reward to create a FRANCHISE in the source categories of Novel, Graphic Novel, Game, or Comic Book.

TV PILOT WRITER + GAME + EX PACKS + BETA + DEVELOPMENT FORUMS - You get one copy of the completed game + BONUS both expansion packs + BONUS you can write one record for the TV Pilot Database. You will give it a Title, write its storyline, and select all of the characters and story attributes. Your name will appear as the "Created By" credit + BONUS you are entitled to participate in the forums during the development of the game + BONUS you can play all beta versions as the game develops.

FRANCHISE AUTHOR x10 + GAME + EX PACKS + BETA + DEVELOPMENT FORUMS - You get one copy of the completed game + BONUS both expansion packs + BONUS you can write TEN records for the Source Database, linking them as a FRANCHISE. The ten records must be in the same source category. Your name will appear as the Author. You will give each record a Title, write its storyline, and select all of the characters and story attributes. + BONUS you may join with friends who have this reward to create a larger franchise + BONUS you are entitled to participate in the forums during the development of the game + BONUS you can play all beta versions as the game develops.

ACTOR + GAME + EX PACKS + BETA + DEVELOPMENT FORUMS - You get one copy of the completed game + BONUS both expansion packs + BONUS you are hard-coded into the game as an Actor (or see Actress, below). You will create your own biography for display in the game, as well as select all of your talent attributes. A digital image of you will appear in the game in the Talent records, and at the annual Hollywood Mogul Awards ceremony if you are nominated. In the opening credits your name will be listed either above the title or below the title, depending on how good your agent is! + BONUS you are entitled to participate in the forums during the development of the game + BONUS you can play all beta versions as the game develops.

ACTRESS + GAME + EX PACKS + BETA + DEVELOPMENT FORUMS - You get one copy of the completed game + BONUS both expansion packs + BONUS you are hard-coded into the game as an Actress (or see Actor, above). You will create your own biography for display in the game, as well as select all of your talent attributes. A digital image of you will appear in the game in the Talent records, and at the annual Hollywood Mogul Awards ceremony if you are nominated. In the opening credits your name will be listed either above the title or below the title, depending on how good your agent is! + BONUS you are entitled to participate in the forums during the development of the game + BONUS you can play all beta versions as the game develops.

PRODUCER + GAME + EX PACKS + BETA + DEVELOPMENT FORUMS - You get one copy of the completed game + BONUS both expansion packs + BONUS you are hard-coded into the game as a Producer. You will create your own biography for display in the game, as well as select all of your talent attributes. A digital image of you will appear in the game in the Talent records. Your name will appear in the opening credits of every movie you produce + BONUS you are entitled to participate in the forums during the development of the game + BONUS you can play all beta versions as the game develops.

TALENT AGENT + GAME + EX PACKS + BETA + DEVELOPMENT FORUMS - You get one copy of the completed game + BONUS both expansion packs + BONUS you are hard-coded into the game as a Talent Agent and a digital image head shot of you will appear in the game representing a multitude of clients. Your character attributes and client list will be randomized at the start of each new game. You may be the most powerful agent in town. Or you may have a whole list of c-grade has-been talent + BONUS you are entitled to participate in the forums during the development of the game + BONUS you can play all beta versions as the game develops.

DIRECTOR + GAME + EX PACKS + BETA + DEVELOPMENT FORUMS - You get one copy of the completed game + BONUS both expansion packs + BONUS you are hard-coded into the game as a Director. You will create your own biography for display in the game, as well as select all of your talent attributes. A digital image of you will appear in the game in the Talent records, and at the annual Hollywood Mogul Awards ceremony if you are nominated. Your name will appear in the Opening Credits of every movie you direct + BONUS you are entitled to participate in the forums during the development of the game + BONUS you can play all beta versions as the game develops.

BUNAGLOW + GAME + EX PACKS + BETA + DEVELOPMENT FORUMS - You get one copy of the completed game + BONUS both expansion packs + BONUS you will have a studio bungalow named after you. At your Hollywood Mogul movie studio there are 24 bungalows. These are used to lure talent to your  studio with Production Deals, keeping them away from the other studios, and giving you a first look at movies or TV Shows they might want to get involved in. You will name your Bungaow. You will create your own biography, or message, for display along with your digital image whenever the Bungalow is selected by the player to make a Production Deal with Talent + BONUS you are entitled to participate in the forums during the development of the game + BONUS you can play all beta versions as the game develops.
